What to do to activate it I must.

item.title: Aux power for sprinting OR breathing
item.dc:creator: Poormetheus
item.description:
Does anyone know where the line of script is for infinite sprint? I want to implement it in my heavily modded HL2.

Thanks!

Read full topic
item.source: Aux power for sprinting OR breathing

item.title: Aux power for sprinting OR breathing
item.dc:creator: Captain_Mcderp
item.description:
Aux power has been completely removed by the Black Mesa devs in favour of a less annoying separate oxygen bar and infinite sprint.

If you desperately want a limited sprint meter you should look for some mods.

Read full topic
item.source: Aux power for sprinting OR breathing
